name: Talking Clay Kids Flippy
description:
Flippy is here! He’s the naughtiest and funniest boy in Clay Kids, now you can enjoy making pranks with him.

He is a troublemaker who doesn't like to study and goes to school only because he has no other choice. He is a rapper and collaborates with Motor on musical projects.

The teacher doesn’t want the students talk in class, but Flippy won't stop repeating everything you say until his mouth gets dry. Give him refreshment until his bladder is about to explode. If you touch Robbie’s hand or the window, several friends will appear to make things worse. Have fun with extra animations, throwing paper balls to the bin or taking a photo with Flippy and send it to all your friends!

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH TALKING CLAY KIDS
- Flippy repeats what you say!
- Interact with him, watch his funny reactions and discover his friends of Clay Kids!
- Play with Flippy and dunk papers into the bin!
- Discover the secrets that Flippy uses to don't get bored in class!
- Give Flippy a refreshment when he feels thirsty, but be careful don't give him too much!
- Share personalized videos with your friends!
- Strike a pose and take silly photos with Flippy.

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone o iPad must have a microphone or headphones with a microphone. If not, the option to repeat your voice will not work.
